name: Escalauncher
description:
This game is a Physics-based Terrible Person Simulator.  Control the escalator to shoot people as high as possible. Your score is determined by the highest a person has gotten, compared to the escalator.

Controls:
Hold W or S to change the speed of the escalator.
Press + or - to change the volume of the game.
Left Mouse Click pushes people under cursor.

Source Code: https://github.com/VodBox/xkcd954

xkcd Font: https://github.com/ipython/xkcd-font (xkcd-script)

Sound Effects:
Escalator - https://freesound.org/people/Dalibor/sounds/34177/
Slap - https://freesound.org/people/peridactyloptrix/sounds/202602/
Crash - https://freesound.org/people/pauliep83/sounds/33675/
Punch - https://freesound.org/people/CastIronCarousel/sounds/216781/
Scream1 - https://freesound.org/people/Coral_Island_Studios/sounds/277562/
Scream2 - https://freesound.org/people/Robinhood76/sounds/62685/
Neigh - https://freesound.org/people/acclivity/sounds/19812/
